assist.desc: Miya works well with Tanks who have powerful CC abilities like Belerick and Tigreal since their CCs give her more opportunities to dish out damage.

strong.desc: Miya counters heroes who rely on targeted CC effects, such as Saber and Eudora, because she can easily escape their CC and respond with a strong counterattack. The split arrows from her 1st Skill are also very effective against heroes that summon units, such as Sun.

weak.desc: Miya is countered by heroes with a lot of AOE damage, such as Pharsa and Yve, because they can still hit her while she is concealed.

1.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/299d8aab8de508fff88c1f1e935017cb.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc:
Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack, she gains 5% Attack Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a <font color="a6aafb">Moonlight Shadow</font> with each Basic Attack that deals 30<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

Miya shoots two extra arrows with each Basic Attack, dealing 10<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target enemy and 30% damage to nearby targets. This effect lasts 4s. Each extra arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.

Miya launches an empowered arrow on the target area, dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s. The arrow then splits into 6 scattering minor arrows, each dealing 40<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

Miya removes all debuffs on her and conceals herself, gaining 35% extra Movement Speed. This state lasts 2s or until she launches an attack.

Miya gains full stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Moon Blessing</font> upon leaving the state.

1.name: Miya
1.story: The Priestess of the Moon and protector of the Moonlit Forest.

assist.desc: Balmond is best with Support heroes that can boost his Mobility and Survivability. Examples include Angela and Rafaela.

strong.desc: Balmond is strong against squishy heroes who lack the ability to escape once he closes the gap on them, such as Layla and Eudora.

weak.desc: Balmond is countered by ranged heroes who can deal damage to Balmond outside of his attack range, such as Lesley and Irithel.

2.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_28de3ca255581db76a796afacea2b203.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Balmond recovers 5% Max HP after killing a Minion or Creep, and 20% Max HP after killing a hero.

Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be knocked back slightly and slowed by 60% for 2s.

Balmond gains 15% Movement Speed that decays over time and spins with his axe for 3s, dealing 25<font color="26e407"> (+2% Extra Max HP)</font> <font color="fba51f"> (+25% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> per hit to nearby enemies up to 14 times. Each subsequent hit on the same enemy will deal 8.5% increased damage (up to 68%).

The Physical Attack bonus portion of the damage can Crit.

Balmond unleashes a huge strike in the target direction (this skill can only be interrupted by Suppression), dealing <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> equal to 150<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 30% of the target's lost HP.

This skill only deals up to 1000 damage to non-hero units.

2.name: Balmond
2.story: The leader of the Orc Legion.

assist.desc: Saber works well with high-damage heroes who can help him burst down enemy heroes in teamfights, such as Kadita and Cyclops.

strong.desc: Saber's deadly combo makes him strong against squishy heroes, such as Layla and Eudora.

weak.desc: Saber is countered by Support heroes with Survivability buffs, like Estes and Faramis.

3.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_9642be6622ac24480431681f09ad7380.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Saber's attacks reduce enemies' Physical Defense by 3-8 for 5s on hit. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Saber shoots out 5 swords that orbit around him, dealing 80<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies on contact. After orbiting around Saber for a period of time, the swords will fly back to Saber.

Within the duration of this skill, when Saber deals damage with his Basic Attacks or skills, he will send an orbiting sword towards the target, dealing 210<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the main target and 50% of the damage to other targets it passes through and reducing the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Charge</font> by 1s. It deals only 50% damage to minions.

Saber dashes in the target direction, dealing 75<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way while enhancing his next Basic Attack. Saber can dash to the target, and his enhanced Basic Attack deals 75<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slows the target by 60% for 1s.

Saber charges at the target enemy hero, knocking them airborne for 1.2s (unaffected by Resilience) and striking them 3 times over the duration. The first two strikes deal 120<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> each, while the third strike deals 240<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

3.name: Saber
3.story: A swordsman in pursuit of invincibility, used by Laboratory 1718.

assist.desc: To compensate for Alice's weaknesses in the early game and form a balanced team, pair her with strong early game heroes, like Balmond or Dyrroth.

strong.desc: With her great sustainability in combat plus her mobility and CC, Alice counters heroes that lack burst and can't escape from melee enemies, such as Cecilion and Chang'e.

weak.desc: Alice is countered by heroes with Execute or Healing Reduction who can impede her from healing herself during the Ultimate. Heroes like Baxia or Martis can reduce her healing or kill her before she can heal.

4.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/86831c838a2bf2a1745811f7eb9496f1.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc:
When Alice's skills hit, she gains 1 stack(s) of <font color="a6aafb">Crimson</font>, lasting 4s. Once <font color="a6aafb">Crimson</font> reaches 2 stacks, <font color="a6aafb">Blood Banquet</font> activates, dealing 25<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 0.5%-2.5% (scales with level) of the target's Max HP as <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies (<font color="a6aafb">Blood Banquet</font> refreshes duration when hitting heroes) and recovering 10<font color="26e407"> (+3% Extra Max HP)</font> HP for Alice every 0.5s.
<font color="a6aafb">Blood Banquet</font> HP recovery from minions is reduced by 30%. Can deal up to 70(+10*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to creeps.

Alice fires blood energy forward, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Before the blood energy dissipates, this skill can be cast again to activate <font color="a6aafb">Scarlet Shadow</font>, allowing Alice to blink to the blood energy's location.

Alice performs a deadly dance, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+130% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1s. If <font color="a6aafb">Blood Banquet</font> is active at this time, it also scorches enemies, dealing 300% of <font color="a6aafb">Blood Banquet</font>'s damage and healing Alice for the same amount.

Alice surrounds herself with blood, gaining Control Immunity and 50% Damage Reduction while slowing herself by 50%. After 1.5s, she descends with force, dealing 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font><font color="26e407"> (+20% Extra Max HP)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in range and immobilizing them for 1s.
While charging her Ultimate, Alice can only use <font color="a6aafb">Scarlet Shadow</font>.

4.name: Alice
4.story: Queen of the Blood Demons and one of the two dominant powers in the Abyss.

assist.desc: Nana works best with heroes with CC skills, that will help her get the kills, such as Rafaela and Franco.

strong.desc: Nana's Passive gives her great survivability, making her strong against heroes with deadly combos, like Eudora and Kadita.

weak.desc: Nana can be countered by heroes with strong chasing abilities, like Zilong, Natalia, because they can chase Nana through her Passive duration.

skilllist.skilldesc:
Upon taking fatal damage, Nana removes all debuffs on her and transforms, becoming untargetable and invincible, and gains 30% Movement Speed for 2s. She also recovers 10% Max HP over the duration.

Nana can only transform once every 150s and cannot cast skills in the transformed form.

Nana hurls her Magic Boomerang in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies hit on its way out and back. The boomerang deals 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit. For every additional enemy hit, the damage is reduced by 10% (max reduction of 30%).

Nana throws Molina at the target location, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within range and <font color="a6aafb">Transforming</font> enemy heroes hit into small animals.

If Molina does not hit an enemy hero, she will remain on the ground and chase the nearest enemy hero that comes into range, <font color="a6aafb">Transforming</font> the first enemy hero she touches.

<font color="a6aafb">Transform</font>: Reduces the target's Movement Speed by 50% and Magic Defense by 30% for 1.5s. Transformed heroes cannot attack or use skills.

Nana summons Molina to strike the target area 3 times, each time dealing 440<font color="62f8fe"> (+140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within and slowing them by 30% for 1s. Enemies hit consecutively will be stunned for 1s.

assist.desc: Tigreal works well with heroes with strong initiation skills, that gives him a better chance to hit the enemies with his CC skills, such as Vexana and Odette.

strong.desc: Tigreal's Passive can negate enemy Basic Attacks, making him strong against heroes that deal damage with their Basic Attacks, such as Zilong and Freya.

weak.desc: But as a melee hero, Tigreal is countered by Ranged Mage heroes like Chang'e and Zhask.

6.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_23660115389f8f5a6e7cee37cde10671.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Tigreal gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Fearless</font> each time he uses a skill or is hit by a Basic Attack. After getting 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all <font color="a6aafb">Fearless</font> stacks to block the next incoming Basic Attack (including attacks from Turrets).

<font color="A4AAC7">Attacks from Minions do not grant</font> <font color="a6aafb">Fearless</font> <font color="A4AAC7">stacks nor trigger its effect</font>.

Tigreal smashes the ground with his hammer and sends a shockwave that erupts 3 times in the target direction, each time dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the fan-shaped area and slowing them by 20%/40%/60% for 1.5s.

Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way and pushing them to the end of the charge.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Tigreal can use this skill again within 4s, dealing 280<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in front of him and knocking them airborne for 0.6s.

Tigreal unleashes the power of his hammer, pulling nearby enemies to him and stunning them for 1.8s while dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+130% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

<font color="A4AAC7">The first half of the channeling can be interrupted by control effects. The second half of the channeling can only be interrupted by Suppression.</font>

6.name: Tigreal
6.story: Leader of the Light's Order, guardian of the Moniyan Empire.

assist.desc: He's best with heroes with crowd control, such as Gatotkaca and Xavier, which makes up for his lack of powerful control abilities.

strong.desc: Alucard has great chase abilities and damage resistance, making him powerful against squishy Assassins like Harley and Aamon.

weak.desc:
But he can be countered by heroes with powerful control abilities like Franco and Johnson. If controlled, Alucard won't be able to steal HP
and can be easily eliminated.

7.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_c20e48bd23fe5edca17dc4c05d561710.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
After each skill cast, Alucard's next Basic Attack allows him to dash to the target's location and deal <font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage.
<font color="a6aafb">Demon Hunter</font>: Alucard deals 10% extra damage to Creeps.

Alucard rolls to the target location and slams his blade on the ground, dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s.
Alucard launches a whirling slash, dealing 345<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Alucard permanently gains 10% Hybrid Lifesteal.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target area, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% and Hybrid Defense by 10. Alucard gains 10 Hybrid Defense for each enemy hero hit, and reduces the cooldown of his other skills to 50% for 6s.
<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Alucard releases a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit.

7.name: Alucard
7.story: Demon hunter who detests the darkness.

assist.desc: Karina works well with heroes who can pull enemies together, such as Tigreal and Faramis, since her Ultimate and 2nd Skill also hits anyone near her main target, setting them up to be chain killed by her Ultimate.

strong.desc: Karina counters Marksmen that lack mobility, such as Layla and Hanabi, since her 1st Skill can neutralize their Basic Attacks and they can't escape her high mobility and burst damage.

weak.desc: Karina is countered by Tanky heroes with CC abilities, like Akai and Khufra because they can tank her damage, and protect their allies from her.

8.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_c5a10fb1fb590ae51d1c7118f3937c14.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Karina's third consecutive attack on the same enemy deals extra <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> equal to 100 plus 5<font color="62f8fe"> (+2.5% Total Magic Power)</font>% of their lost HP (up to 2000 <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> against creeps).

If the target is an enemy hero, the cooldowns of Karina's non-Ultimate skills are reduced by 1.5s.

Karina enters the <font color="a6aafb">Dance of Blades</font> state for 3.5s, during which she gains 45% extra Movement Speed, blocks all incoming Basic Attacks, and reflects 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker (the damage reflection effect has a cooldown of 0.4s).

Karina's next Basic Attack within the duration deals 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+55% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>, slows the target by 45% for 1s, and is guaranteed to Crit. Casting the enhanced Basic Attack or <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Assault</font> ends the <font color="a6aafb">Dance of Blades</font> state early.
Karina launches a spinning slash, dealing 375<font color="62f8fe"> (+125% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

Karina dashes to the target enemy hero, dealing them 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+160% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>, applying a <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font> to them, and leaving a <font color="a6aafb">Shadowform</font> behind them. The <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Shadowform</font> both last 5s. If the enemy dies within the duration, the cooldown of this skill is reset.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Karina dashes back to the <font color="a6aafb">Shadowform</font>'s location, dealing 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies along the way.

8.name: Karina
8.story: Killer from the Dark Elf tribe who is fighting to rescue her sister Selena.

assist.desc: Akai works best with heroes who can deal high burst damage as they can help him take down enemies caught in his Ultimate, such as Saber and Eudora.

strong.desc: Akai is strong against heroes with poor Mobility since he can easily catch and eliminate them with his Ultimate, such as Eudora and Odette.

weak.desc: Akai is countered by heroes with CC removers or transformation abilities that allow them to escape or counter Akai's Ultimate, such as Nana and Diggie.

9.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/1fee18007166e2e449239587545c2c10.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Akai gains a 25<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> shield for 4s on each skill cast and marks enemy heroes and Creeps hit by his skills.

Akai's Basic Attacks deal 25<font color="26e407"> (+5% Total HP)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to marked enemies.

Akai charges in the target direction, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies along the way. If Akai hits an enemy hero during this process, he'll knock them airborne for 0.5s and be able to roll in the Joystick's direction once.

Akai can cast <font color="a6aafb">Headbutt</font> during <font color="a6aafb">Heavy Spin</font> to quickly adjust his position.
Akai smashes the ground with his body, dealing 270<font color="26e407"> (+6% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 45% for 2s.

Akai removes all debuffs on him and spins for 4s, gaining Slow Immunity while continuously dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Enemy heroes knocked back will knock back other heroes they collide with during the process.

Akai also gradually increases his Movement Speed by 70% over the duration. This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression.

9.name: Akai
9.story: The almighty panda hero of Stream Valley.

assist.desc: Heroes with high burst damage such as Vale, Karina and Brody to take advantage of his CC.

strong.desc: Heroes with low mobility like Vale, Estes and Layla.

weak.desc: Heroes with high mobility or Control Immunity such as Wanwan, Fanny and Badang.

10.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_64e00f9a9ce834e493c13f1e52e15f62.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
If no damage is taken within 5s, Franco gains 10% Movement Speed, recovers 1% Max HP per second, and begins accumulating <font color="a6aafb">Wasteland Force</font> (up to 10 stacks).

Franco will consume all <font color="a6aafb">Wasteland Force</font> stacks on his next skill cast to increase the skill's damage by up to 150%.

Franco launches an iron hook in the target direction. The hook will snag the first enemy unit hit, dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and dragging them to Franco.
Franco lashes out, dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 300 plus 4% of his Max HP to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1.5s.

Franco suppresses the target enemy hero for 1.8s and strikes them 6 times over the duration, each time dealing 50<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

10.name: Franco
10.story: Brave permafrost warrior, Bane's sworn enemy.

assist.desc: Bane works best with heroes like as Tigreal and Luo Yi who can pull enemies together so he can do even more damage with his AOE.

strong.desc: Bane counters Tanks with high HP but low damage, such as Hylos and Belerick, because he can out-sustain them and deals HP percentage-based damage.

weak.desc: Bane is countered by Mages that deal heavy damage from afar, such as Vale and Xavier who can deal significant damage to him before he can get in range.

11.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/ec9fd2ca0f85e66b324beaf7febfde63.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Bane infuses his weapon with a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Tidal Energy</font> each time he uses a skill (up to 2 stacks). Each of his subsequent Basic Attacks consumes a stack to deal <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to <font color="fba51f"> (+95% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 4(+0.4*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies.

Bane fires his Crab Claw Cannon in the target direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and then 150% damage to a random enemy behind them (prioritizes enemy heroes). Enemies hit are slowed by 10<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font>% for 1s.

Every 100 <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> Bane possesses reduces this skill's cooldown by an additional 8%.

Bane chugs his ale, recovering 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 5<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.5% Total Magic Power)</font>% of his lost HP and gaining 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Bane spits venom in the target direction, dealing 130<font color="62f8fe"> (+130% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales up to 250% with charging time) to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Every 100 <font color="62f8fe">Magic Power</font> Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 7%.

Bane summons a school of sharks to charge in the target direction, dealing 700<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit, knocking them airborne for 0.6s, and slowing them by 75% (decays over 3s).
This skill deals 40% damage to turrets.

11.name: Bane
11.story: Cruel pirate leader, Franco's sworn enemy.

assist.desc: Bruno is best with Supports that can force enemies to engage and allow him to make use of his early game damage, such as Franco and Khufra.

strong.desc: Bruno is strong against Marksmen that are weaker in the early game like Hanabi and Miya who Bruno can out-trade thanks to his high damage.

weak.desc: Bruno is countered by Tanks with high Physical Defense like Gatotkaca and Fredrinn that take greatly reduced damage from his attacks.

12.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/af551d16e9c04164c90e209dc4c75b1c.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc:
Bruno gains 2.5% extra Crit Chance each time he deals damage with his skills (up to 8 stacks).

Bruno has higher Physical Attack but only gains 80% extra Attack Speed from all sources.

Bruno kicks a Powerball on his next Basic Attack, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target, slowing them by 30%, and speeding up by 30% for 0.5s.

The Powerball then bounces back toward Bruno and lands on the ground. He or allied heroes can retrieve the Powerball for another attack and reduce the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Flying Tackle</font> by 1s.

Bruno makes a slide tackle in the target direction, dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in his path and stunning them for 0.5s.

If the Powerball is bouncing back, Bruno also draws the Powerball toward him.

Bruno kicks his Energy Ball at the target enemy hero, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+83% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and knocking them back. The Energy Ball then bounces between nearby enemies up to 10 times, each time dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Each hit also reduces the enemy's Physical Defense by 4% for 8s (up to 3 stacks).

12.name: Bruno
12.story: The captain of the Eruditio Rangers that protects the city with his amazing football skills.

assist.desc: Clint works best with Supportsthat can enhance his kiting ability, such as Rafaela and Angela.

strong.desc: Clint counters heroes with comparatively shorter range like Moskov and Miya thanks to the superior range of his skills and Basic Attacks.

weak.desc: Clint is countered by Marksmen with burst damage like Melissa and Karrie since he lacks burst in the early and mid game to trade blows with them.

13.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/424de435edcaf67ab6ac211a3db646a6.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc: After each skill cast, Clint's next Basic Attack within 4s penetrates a line of enemies, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. This damage can trigger attack effects, and the part affected by Physical Attack can Crit.

Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the enemy hit.

The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullets will take less damage after the first bullet.

Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

Successfully hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%.

Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 280<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing them by 50% for 0.5s.

Clint gains a grenade charge every 10s (up to 3).

13.name: Clint
13.story: A sharpshooter full of righteousness and justice.

assist.desc: When teamed up with Fighters like Freya and Lapu-Lapu, Rafaela can boost their offensive power and survivability.

strong.desc: Rafaela has great healing and decent mobility, and performs well against heroes that lack burst damage or mobility, such as Masha and Barats.

weak.desc: Rafaela struggles against bursty and agile Assassins, like Ling and Hayabusa.

14.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_cff725e14a043421803080af07949c0e.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Rafaela can cast a special skill every 40s. After channeling for 2.5s, she instantly resurrects an ally and increases their Movement Speed by 30% for 5s (taking damage from heroes and Legend Creeps interrupts channeling and puts the skill on base cooldown).
This skill's cooldown is increased by 500% of the target's remaining respawn time, capped at 240s. This skill is not affected by Cooldown Reduction.

Rafaela strikes the three nearest enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Light of Retribution</font>, dealing them 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>, briefly revealing their positions, and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. Enemies hit by <font color="a6aafb">Light of Retribution</font> again within 6s will take 20% extra damage (this effect stacks up to 3 times).

Rafaela calls upon Holy Light, recovering 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+35% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for nearby allied heroes, plus an additional 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+45% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for herself and the most injured allied hero in range. She also increases the Movement Speed of nearby allied heroes by 30% and grants Slow Immunity for 1s.

Every 20 point(s) of Magic Power will add 1% to the Movement Speed bonus.

Rafaela unleashes the true power of <font color="a6aafb">Holy Light</font> in the target direction, dealing 460<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a line and stunning them for 1.2s.

14.name: Rafaela
14.story: An angel loved and respected by the people of this world.

assist.desc: Eudora works best with heroes who can provide extra Mobility to their teammates, such as Johnson and Jawhead.

strong.desc: Eudora can counter squishy Marksman and Assassins heroes, like Wanwan and Moskov.

weak.desc: Eudora is countered by tanky heroes with strong HP Regen, such as Fredrinn.

15.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_e71b09906fa9b08d12a227ac5b8573f1.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Eudora's skills inflict <font color="a6aafb">Superconductor</font> for 3s on hit and can trigger additional effects against enemies affected by <font color="a6aafb">Superconductor</font>.

Eudora casts forked lightning in the target direction, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

Enemies affected by <font color="a6aafb">Superconductor</font> will take 190<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> extra <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> after a short delay.

Eudora hurls an orb of lightning at the target enemy, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>, stunning them for 1.2s, and reducing their Magic Defense by 10 for 1.8s.

If the enemy is affected by <font color="a6aafb">Superconductor</font>, the lightning orb will bounce to up to 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), dealing 175<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and stunning them for 0.9s.

Eudora calls down a blast of lightning on the target enemy, dealing 480<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

If the enemy is affected by <font color="a6aafb">Superconductor</font>, dark clouds appear over their head and unleash an additional lightning strike on the area after 0.8s, dealing 440<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within and 360<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

15.name: Eudora
15.story: Dean of the Ulturia School of the Magic Academy, Light Elf.

assist.desc: Zilong works best with heroes with strong defensive abilities that can hold off enemy attacks while he solos the lane, such as Pharsa and Hanabi.

strong.desc: The immunity to Slow effects that Zilong gets from his Ultimate makes him strong against squishy heroes without CC skills, such as Layla and Lylia.

weak.desc: Zilong is still vulnerable to non-slow CC skills, making him weak against heroes with powerful single-target CC skills, such as Franco and Nana.

16.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_af87bb386288a5edb9afa85c1b07da3d.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
After every 3 Basic Attacks, Zilong triggers <font color="a6aafb">Dragon Flurry</font> on the next Basic Attack, hitting the target 3 times. Each hit deals 30<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> Basic Attack damage and heals himself for 50<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP.
If the target's HP is below 50%, all damage dealt by Zilong's skills and Basic Attacks is increased by 30.
Zilong flings the target enemy over his head, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

Zilong lunges at the target enemy, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 2s. He then launches a Basic Attack on the same target.

The cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Spear Strike</font> is reset each time Zilong kills an enemy.

Zilong removes all slow effects on himself and gains 40% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, and Slow Immunity for 7.5s.

For the duration, he can trigger <font color="a6aafb">Dragon Flurry</font> after every 2 Basic Attacks (instead of the previous 3).

16.name: Zilong
16.story: Guardian of the Dragon Altar and the Oriental Fighter who inherited the Cloud Dragon's power.

assist.desc: Fanny works best with heroes that can chain AOE CC to keep the enemy pinned, such as Minotaur and Gatotkaca, so she can deal damage without interruption.

strong.desc: Fanny counters squishy heroes that lack targeted CC like Karrie and Irithel who cannot stop Fanny's extreme mobility while she bursts them down.

weak.desc: Fanny is countered by heroes that can restrict mobility, such as Kaja and Khufra, since they can easily shutdown her main advantage.

17.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_ae8ca46da01da69619a6c03dc7069921.png

skilllist.skilldesc: During flight, Fanny deals 10%-20% extra damage to enemies hit (scales with flying speed) and applies a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Prey Mark</font> to them (up to 2 stacks) on each attack. Her subsequent skill hits on marked enemy heroes restore 8 energy per stack for her. The energy restoration is reduced if she hits multiple enemy heroes within a short period of time.
Fanny whirls her blades, dealing 275<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies.

Fanny shoots a cable in the target direction that pulls her to the first obstacle hit. She can cast this skill again within 2s until her energy runs out. Each successive cast reduces the skill's energy cost by 2.

Fanny automatically casts <font color="a6aafb">Tornado Strike</font> upon hitting an enemy mid-flight, as long as her energy is sufficient.

Fanny leaps at the target enemy hero or Creep with her blades, dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Prey Mark</font> on the target increases this damage by 30%.

17.name: Fanny
17.story: A blade dancer in the battlefield.

assist.desc: Layla works best with Tanks that can protect backline heroes, such as Minsitthar and Belerick, since their protection gives Layla more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Layla's relatively longer attack range lets her counter slow Tanks like Tigreal and Belerick.

weak.desc: Layla is countered by Assassins with high burst damage, such as Karina and Ling, as they can get the jump on Layla and melt her easily.

18.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/f222c954b85dce735916d61fc355668a.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (starting at 100% and increasing to 115% at 6 units away). This does not include Turrets.

Layla fires a Malefic Bomb in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit (can Crit).

Upon hitting an enemy, Layla's Basic Attacks and <font color="a6aafb">Void Projectile</font> gain extra range for 3s, and she gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. The duration of the Movement Speed boost is doubled if an enemy hero is hit.

Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target enemy that explodes on hit, dealing 170<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to targets in the area and applying a <font color="a6aafb">Magic Mark</font> on them for 3s.
When Layla hits an enemy with a <font color="a6aafb">Magic Mark</font>, she deals 100<font color="fba51f"> (+35% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.25s.

Layla fires a blast of Malefic Energy in the target direction, dealing 500<font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a line.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive:</font> The range of Layla's <font color="a6aafb">Void Projectile</font> and Basic Attacks is increased by 0.6 units. Her sight range is also slightly increased each time this skill is upgraded.

18.name: Layla
18.story: The backbone of the Eruditio Rangers who is also known as the Shining Star.

assist.desc: Minotaur works best with burst damage Marksmen, such as Granger and Melissa, since his CC's give them more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Minotaur is strong against heroes that rely on chaining skills or attacks, like Paquito and Julian because he can interrupt their combos with his CC.

weak.desc: Minotaur is countered by long-range Marksmen like Layla and Lesley since his lack of speed makes him an easy target.

19.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_6104e5d77623c131a84b88575739713d.png

skilllist.skilldesc: When Minotaur applies a control effect to an enemy hero with a skill, he will also reduce their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level). When Minotaur heals an allied hero with a skill, he will also increase their Hybrid Defense by 5 (+0.5*Hero Level) for 2s. These effects are doubled in Enraged state.

Minotaur jumps to the target location, dealing 280<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and briefly knocking them airborne. Enemies hit will also be slowed by 40% while Minotaur enhances his Basic Attacks to deal <font color="26e407"> (+3% Total HP)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> for 2s.

<font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font>: Increases the AOE range and the damage dealt by <font color="26e407"> (+3% Total HP)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

Minotaur motivates himself and nearby allied heroes, recovering 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for himself and his allies. Minotaur additionally recovers 5% of his lost HP.

<font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font>: Minotaur gains <font color="a6aafb">Enraged Regen</font> for 2s, during which he recovers HP equal to 100% of damage taken from enemy heroes' Basic Attacks.

Minotaur enters <font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font> state and smashes the ground 3 times. The first 2 hits deal 180<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and slow them by 40%, while the final hit deals 200<font color="ffe63c"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and knocks targets airborne for 1s. Minotaur is immune to control effects during this attack.

The <font color="a6aafb">Enraged</font> state lasts 12s and enhances Minotaur's skills for the duration.

19.name: Minotaur
19.story: Minoan prince determined to restore his homeland.

assist.desc: Due to her powerful defensive and CC abilities, Lolita is great at protecting Marksmen like Hanabi and Layla.

strong.desc: Lolita's shield makes her strong against heroes who rely on projectiles and ranged skills, such as Kimmy and Cyclops.

weak.desc: Lolita is countered by melee heroes with high burst damage like Ling and Paquito.

20.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/ce1c7af1a946f70585e40296ba85c9c0.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc: Every 6s, the Noumenon Energy Core grants a 20<font color="26e407"> (+2.5% Total HP)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> shield to Lolita and nearby allied heroes, and an extra shield after a skill or the Ultimate is cast. This shield can stack up to 3 times and lasts 30s.

Lolita dashes in the target direction. Her next Basic Attack within 4s will perform a short dash to the target, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and stunning them for 0.5s. This damage is doubled against Minions.

Lolita raises her shield and reflects all incoming ranged Basic Attacks and <font color="a6aafb">Projectiles</font> in the direction of the shield for 3s. The shield will break after taking 1000<font color="26e407"> (+15% Total HP)</font> damage.

The damage and effects from the Unique Passives of an attacker's equipment will not apply to the shield and will not be reflected. This skill can be interrupted by high level control effects.

Lolita begins charging for 2s while slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area by 50%. When the charging is complete or is stopped, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing up to 500<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for up to 2s (the damage and stun duration are based on the charge time).

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Lolita immediately stops charging and slams her hammer on the ground.

20.name: Lolita
20.story: Member of the Eruditio Rangers and protector of the Leviathan workshop.

assist.desc: Hayabusa works best with Fighters like Lapu-Lapu and Alpha who can initiate with him to quickly focus down key targets.

strong.desc: Hayabusa counters squishy heroes that lack CC to shutdown the blinks from his 2nd Skill, and who are also easy targets for his Ultimate, such as Chang'e and Cecilion.

weak.desc: Hayabusa is countered by heroes with targeted CC like Franco and Kaja who can lock him down before he can blink away.

21.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/fa4a5039fcabbfe232be96f533d1318e.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Hayabusa's attacks apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font> on hit (up to 4 stacks). Each stack lasts 6s and increases Hayabusa's damage to the enemy by 5%.

Hayabusa throws three returning shurikens in the target direction, each dealing 220<font color="fba51f"> (+75% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 35% for 2s. Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take 70% less damage after the first hit, and Creeps take 50% less damage after the first hit. Hayabusa restores 10 energy when hitting non-Minion enemies.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Hayabusa permanently gains 3% Spell Vamp.

Hayabusa dashes in the target direction and releases four phantoms that travel in separate directions. The phantoms will remain at the end of their paths or attach themselves to the first enemy hero hit, dealing 130<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Hayabusa will immediately stop if he hits an enemy hero during the dash.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Hayabusa teleports to a phantom's location and reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken</font> by 1s. If the phantom is attached to an enemy hero, he also deals 130<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the enemy.

Hayabusa blends into the shadows and launches 6 single-target attacks on enemies in the area, each dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+32% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

The attacks prioritize enemies with <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font> and each will consume a mark to deal 90<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Extra Physical Attack)</font> extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Shadow Kill does not apply <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Mark</font>.

21.name: Hayabusa
21.story: The young leader of the Shadow Sect who wields his blade through moonless nights, walking the path of nindo without fear.

assist.desc: Pairing Freya with Tanks that have strong Crowd Control skills such as Belerick and Gatotkaca can provide her with more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Freya is excellent in sustained combat, making her a good counter against low damage Tanks like Uranus and Gloo.

weak.desc: Freya is countered by high mobility Fighters like Guinevere and Martis. Their ability to quickly disengage from combat hurts Freya's reliance on sustained damage.

22.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_9c1217743165a25235da367d94a1e1f0.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
After casting a skill, Freya gains 200% Attack Speed for her next 2 Basic Attacks (this effect can stack up to 6 times).

Freya gains 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Sacred Orb</font> on each Basic Attack and can spend <font color="a6aafb">Sacred Orb</font> stacks to cast <font color="a6aafb">Spirit Combo</font> consecutively.
Freya's Basic Attacks only deal 75% damage to Creeps.
Freya jumps to the target location, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and pulling them towards her.

Freya strikes in the target direction, gaining a 60<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield while dealing 20<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s. Freya can cast this skill again within 3.5s at the cost of 2 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Sacred Orb</font>.

On the <font color="a6aafb">3rd cast</font>, Freya leaps into the air and smashes the area below, dealing 26<font color="fba51f"> (+108% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within range and knocking them airborne for 0.4s.

Freya gains 6 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Sacred Orb</font> and enters the <font color="a6aafb">Valkyrie</font> state, gaining a 600<font color="fba51f"> (+180% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield and 30 Physical Attack. Meanwhile, her Basic Attacks become ranged and deal <font color="a6aafb">splash</font> damage. The <font color="a6aafb">Valkyrie</font> state lasts for 10s.

22.name: Freya
22.story: The Valkyrie who guards the Northern Vale.

assist.desc: Gord works well with tanky heroes with reliable CCs, like Hylos and Belerick.

strong.desc: Gord is strong against melee heroes with poor Mobility, such as Barats and Fredrinn.

weak.desc: Gord is countered by heroes with gap closers, such as Fanny and Lancelot.

23.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_dd6cd6f49d0934033eaf7b5d0c1856fc.png

skilllist.skilldesc: After Gord hits an enemy 4 times with skills within a short period of time, the next skill damage will deal an additional 140<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and slow them by 20% for 1s (the slow effect stacks up to 2 times).

Gord conjures a Mystic Orb that bounces in the target direction and explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 270<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area, while stunning them and revealing their locations for 1s.

Gord creates an energy field in the target area, dealing 30<font color="62f8fe"> (+14% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.25s to enemies within (up to 16 times).

Gord unleashes an energy beam in the target direction, dealing 110<font color="62f8fe"> (+32% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit every 0.2s (up to 16 times).

The direction of the beam can be adjusted using the Joystick.

23.name: Gord
23.story: Dean of the Icarus School of the Magic Academy.

assist.desc: Natalia works best with heroes with high AOE damage such as Yi Sun-shin and Vexana. She can stay hidden while they poke the enemy, then pounce on targets that get low on HP.

strong.desc: Natalia counters squishy heroes who lack CC and burst like as Novaria and Irithel since they can't stop Natalia's burst damage.

weak.desc: Natalia is countered by heroes who can restrict her mobility like Minsitthar and Kaja since they can easily shutdown her main advantage.

24.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_167abfbefedc99d6be616bb97f3f0b1f.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
If Natalia stays in a bush without taking damage for 1s, she will enter <font color="a6aafb">Camouflage</font> state and gain 15% Movement Speed. In this state, Natalia's next Basic Attack will teleport her behind her target and deal 200<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> while silencing the target for 0.25s.

Dealing damage, taking damage or using skills will immediately end the <font color="a6aafb">Camouflage</font> state, but her next Basic Attack will remain enhanced for another 1s.

Natalia's base Crit Damage is reduced to 150%, but her damage to Creeps is increased to 150%.

Natalia dashes in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in her path.

After hitting an enemy, she can cast this skill again within 5s.
Natalia releases a <font color="a6aafb">Smoke Bomb</font> at her location, slowing enemies within by 25% while Natalia becomes immune to enemy Basic Attacks for 4s.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Natalia gains 15% extra Crit Chance.

<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Natalia immediately enters <font color="a6aafb">Assassin Instinct</font> state. Natalia can store up to 2 charges of her Ultimate and each charge has a recharge time of 30s. Creep kills will reduce the current remaining recharge time by 50% of the full recharge time.

24.name: Natalia
24.story: An assassin exiled by the Empire.

assist.desc: Kagura works well with tank heroes with strong CC skills that allow her to deal more damage with her Ultimate, such as Atlas and Tigreal.

strong.desc: Kagura's Ultimate can deal high burst damage, making her strong against back-row heroes with no dash or blink, such as Layla and Eudora.

weak.desc: Kagura is countered by heroes with more than one control immunity abilities that allow them to escape her various CC skills, heroes like Joy and Martis are good examples.

25.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/f4b49a4cef7926adb059933d0158a967.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Upon retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, Kagura gains a 450<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.

Kagura sends the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> to the target location, dealing 315<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
This skill deals 130% damage to non-hero enemies.
Kagura removes all debuffs on her and leaps in the target direction, while leaving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> behind.

Kagura invokes the power of the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, dealing 330<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.

Upon retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, Kagura gains a 450<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.

Kagura sends the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> to the target location, dealing 315<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
This skill deals 130% damage to non-hero enemies.

Kagura teleports to the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>'s location and retrieves it, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the nearby enemies.

Kagura invokes the power of the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, resetting the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella Open</font>, dealing 290<font color="62f8fe"> (+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies around the Umbrella, and slowing them by 60%. After 1.5s, enemy heroes around the Umbrella will be pulled toward it and dealt 550<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

25.name: Kagura
25.story: A young spirit born of the deep longings stored within the Seimei Umbrella, she has finally stepped out of her dream, like a radiant bloom, in defiance of the dark night.

assist.desc: Chou works best with Healers that can boost his survivability and speed, such as Angela and Rafaela.

strong.desc: Chou counters slower Fighters like Terizla and Alpha that have a hard time dealing with his quick hit and run tactics.

weak.desc: Chou is countered by heroes with very long-range like Lesley and Pharsa that can take out a chunk of his HP before he can get close.

26.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_d0f3f3411e585c106a34f0e57c157c8c.png

skilllist.skilldesc: After traveling 5 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot Crit), briefly slows the target by 90% and reduces their Physical Defense by 10(+1*Hero Level) for 3s (up to 2 stacks).

Chou strikes in the target direction, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. This skill can be cast 3 times before it goes on cooldown. On the 3rd cast, Chou also knocks enemies hit airborne.

Hitting an enemy hero with the 3rd cast resets the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Shunpo</font>.
Chou charges in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity and a 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield.

Chou strikes a roundhouse kick at the target enemy hero, dealing them 400<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and knocking them back.

Cast the skill again to chase up the target, dealing a total of 480<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

26.name: Chou
26.story: A talented fighter with a heart of chivalry.

assist.desc: Pair Sun with tanks who have strong CC abilities such as Belerick or Tigreal to create opportunities for Sun to deal damage.

strong.desc: Sun can deal great sustained damage and has armor-busting capabilities, making him a good counter to tanks with low damage output, such as Franco and Gatotkaca.

weak.desc: Fighter heroes with Lifesteal can counter Sun, however. For example, heroes like Ruby can steal a lot of HP by hitting Sun and his Dopplegangers.

27.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/9b8b253c24f0cca3b9a31edf90006524.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc:
Enemies hit by Sun and his Doppelgangers will have their Physical Defense reduced by 5% (stacks up to 6 times). Sun recovers HP equal to 75 plus 25% of the Doppelganger's Physical Attack each time a Doppelganger deals damage.
Sun and his Doppelgangers' Basic Attacks deal 50 extra damage to Creeps.

Sun hurls his <font color="a6aafb">Golden Staff</font> in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy hero or Creep, or reaching the maximum range, the <font color="a6aafb">Golden Staff</font> morphs into a Doppelganger that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of Sun's attributes (and a portion of his Attack Effects).

<font color="a6aafb">Endless Variety</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Swift Exchange</font> are learned and upgraded together and share the same cooldown.

Sun hurls his <font color="a6aafb">Golden Staff</font> in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path.
He conjures a Doppelganger at his location that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of his attributes (and a portion of Attack Effects). Meanwhile, Sun conceals himself and moves with the <font color="a6aafb">Golden Staff</font>.

Sun commands his Doppelgangers to strike at the target enemy with him, dealing 270<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing the target and enemies behind them by 20% (can be stacked) for 1.5s. This counts as Basic Attack damage and can trigger Attack Effects but cannot Crit.
Sun summons a Doppelganger that lasts 8s and inherits 70% of his attributes and a portion of his Attack Effects. The Doppelganger takes increased damage.

27.name: Sun
27.story: The immortal Monkey King, resolute and unyielding like the mountain that bore him.

assist.desc: Alpha works well with heroes that can initiate with CC like Vexana and Selena. With their help, he'll have a much easier time landing his skills.

strong.desc: Alpha counters heroes that lack mobility, such as Layla and Ixia, because these heroes have a hard time avoiding his skills.

weak.desc: Alpha is countered by heroes that are very mobile, such as Chou and Gusion, because they have a lot of ways to dodge Alpha's skills.

28.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_eed2e33ec8c273b456e011b4732b42e8.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
When Alpha uses a skill, Beta will be summoned to attack. Enemies that are hit by Beta 2 time(s) will be <font color="a6aafb">Locked On</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Locked On</font>: After Alpha deals damage to the target, Beta will fire a laser at them, dealing 80<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">(+8*Hero Level)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and briefly applying a powerful slow effect.
This skill only deals 75% damage to Creeps.

Alpha unleashes an energy wave in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.

After a short delay, Alpha swings his blade in the target direction, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and restoring 40<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> HP for each enemy hit.

Beta then strafes enemies in the same area, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.

Beta dives to the target location, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s. Alpha then leaps towards the same location, knocking enemies in his path airborne and carrying them to the landing location. Alpha then slams down, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing the enemies by 40% for 1.5s.

Beta then attacks the same area 5 times, dealing 15<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> each time.

28.name: Alpha
28.story: A pure cyborg made by Laboratory 1718.

assist.desc: Ruby works best with heroes who can deal high AOE burst damage. Their skills can deal more damage to enemies who are stunned and pulled by her 2nd and Ultimate skills. Such as Pharsa and Kadita.

strong.desc: Ruby is strong against Fighter heroes with high burst damage. She can easily survive their burst with her excellent Regen and Lifesteal abilities. Such as Aldous and Guinevere.

weak.desc: Ruby is countered by Marksman heroes with good Mobility. Because they can easily dodge her 2nd and Ultimate skills. Like Wanwan and Irithel.

29.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_73beab0536050bba2b6c52489b5bd230.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Ruby starts with 6%-20% Spell Vamp (scales with level) and her skills have a 125% Spell Vamp Ratio (but her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal).

After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location and gains 8-25 Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level) for 4s (stacks up to 3 times).

Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. She then unleashes a shockwave in the same direction, dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+55% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her.

Ruby sweeps her scythe in the target direction, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit, pulling them toward her, and stunning them for 0.5s.

29.name: Ruby
29.story: A girl who grew up with Roger's help.

assist.desc: Yi Sun-shin works best with Fighters who can initiate, such as Alpha and Khaleed, so he can follow up and unleash his full damage after they have CC'd the enemy.

strong.desc: Yi Sun-shin counters heroes that lack CC like Uranus and Terizla who are at the mercy of his ability to jump in and out of melee range using his 2 weapons.

weak.desc: Yi Sun-shin is countered by heroes with CC skills, such as Franco and Kaja who can lock him down and stop him from freely swapping weapons.

30.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_2c58c685825527c0643de5e0af8e0c2a.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Yi Sun-shin attacks with his <font color="a6aafb">longbow</font> or <font color="a6aafb">glaive</font> according to his distance from the target.
<font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font>: After each weapon switch, the next two Basic Attacks will gain extra Attack Speed, dealing 70% and 55% Crit Damage respectively, and gain 15% Movement Speed for 1s.

Yi Sun-shin dashes forward and slashes with his glaive, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and becoming immune to control effects for 1s.

Each <font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font> triggered reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Traceless</font> by 1s.

<font color="a6aafb">Tap</font>: Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.
<font color="a6aafb">Hold</font>: Yi Sun-shin shoots a powerful arrow, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target. The arrow's damage scales with the hold time, up to 200%.
Yi Sun-shin gains <font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font> immediately when this skill is used.

Yi Sun-shin summons a turtle ship and gains sight of the whole map for 5s. The turtle ship lasts for up to 15s, during which Yi Sun-shin gains 70% burst Movement Speed (decays to 20% over 2s).
When cast again, Yi Sun-shin commands the turtle ship to ram toward the target area, dealing 160<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and stunning enemy units in the central area for 0.8s. Then Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of cannon shots on a larger area, each dealing 160<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing the enemies by 30%.
Yi Sun-shin gains <font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font> effect immediately when this skill is used.

30.name: Yi Sun-shin
30.story: Leader of the City of the Dragon Fleet.

assist.desc: Moskov works well with heroes like Atlas and Gatotkaca who can CC groups of enemies so he can focus on maximizing the damage of his piercing AOE.

strong.desc: Moskov's 1st Skill provides a blink effect, making him a threat to fighters with poor mobility like Thamuz and Balmond.

weak.desc: Moskov is countered by heroes with high mobility, such as Lancelot and Natalia, who can quickly close the gap and take him out.

31.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/5c4587c25e681be1aecfda0cfbe44714.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Moskov's Basic Attacks can penetrate the target and deal <font color="fba51f"> (+68% Total Physical Attack)</font>-<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies behind them (scales with hero level). Each Basic Attack hit reduces the cooldowns of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font> by 0.8s and <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Misery</font> by 0.8s.

Moskov teleports to the target location, increasing his Attack Speed to 1.15 times for 3s. Meanwhile, his Basic Attack deals <font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> more damage to enemies behind the primary target.

Moskov launches a powerful strike at the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, knocking them back, and revealing their position for 2s.

If the target collides with an enemy hero when knocked back, they'll both take 200<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and be stunned for 1.2s. If the enemy is knocked into a wall, they will also be stunned for the same duration.

After a short delay, Moskov throws the <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Destruction</font> in the target direction, dealing 340<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path and to the first enemy hero hit. Upon hitting an enemy hero, the spear pierces them, dealing 10% extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies behind them. The target and enemies hit by the piercing damage will be slowed by 50% for 1s (the slow duration scales with the spear's travel time, up to 3s).

When <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Destruction</font> hits the first enemy hero, it creates a shadow behind them and refreshes the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Moskov casts <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font> from the shadow's location (shares the same cooldown as the skill).

31.name: Moskov
31.story: A warrior of the desert that embraced the darkness to seek his revenge.

assist.desc: Johnson works well with heroes that need help initiating like Odette and Kadita since they can just jump into Johnson's Ultimate for a ride.

strong.desc:
Johnson counters melee heroes with high burst like Alucard and Zilong
because of Johnson's high Physical Defense and CC ability.

weak.desc: Johnson is countered by agile heroes who deal Magic Damage such as Harith and Kagura because they can easily dodge Johnson's skills while their damage is not affected by his Physical Defense.

32.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/6207fbd29715174199c9b0b221e33998.jpg

skilllist.skilldesc: When Johnson's HP drops below 30%, he gains a 300<font color="26e407"> (+700% Total Physical Defense)</font> shield for 10s. Cooldown: 100s.

Johnson throws his wrench toward the target location, dealing 120<font color="26e407"> (+220% Total Physical Defense)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path. Enemies around the landing point are stunned for 0.8s.

Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 120<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area in the target direction, reducing their Movement Speed and Magic Defense by 10% (stacks up to 3 times) for 2s.
While his shield is raised, Johnson can perform Basic Attacks and cast skills.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Johnson's Physical Defense is increased by 10%.
Johnson transforms into a car. An allied hero can use <font color="a6aafb">Hop In</font> when near Johnson to board the car (only 1 allied hero can ride with Johnson). The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+160% Total Magic Power)</font>-450<font color="62f8fe"> (+280% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5-1s (scales with driving time), and creating an electrified zone at the location. The zone continuously deals 60<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slows enemies within. Johnson's location will be revealed to the enemy for 3s when casting this skill.

32.name: Johnson
32.story: A super cyborg who can transform into a car and lead his teammates into battle.

assist.desc: Cyclops is best with tanky heroes with strong CC skills, like Belerick and Minsitthar.

strong.desc: Cyclops' short skill cooldown makes him strong against mid-ranged heroes with poor Mobility, such as Terizla and Alpha.

weak.desc: Cyclops lacks Dash or Blink skills, making him the preferred target for heroes with gap closers and CC skills. Such as Lancelot, Alucard and Kagura.

33.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_fc97f5a70d8eeacbc455e88030dc80de.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Each time Cyclops hits an enemy with his skills, all his skill cooldowns are reduced by 0.5s.
Cyclops casts two Stardust Disks in the target direction, each dealing 275<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path.

Cyclops conjures Starlit Spheres around himself while gaining 50% Movement Speed that decays over 2s. The spheres will automatically seek and attack nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), exploding on collision and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy. Enemies hit by multiple spheres will take reduced damage after the first hit.

Cyclops creates a Planetary Sphere and sends it after the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and immobilizing them for 0.75-1.5s (increases with travel distance).

33.name: Cyclops
33.story: A celestial traveler in the universe.

assist.desc: Estes works best with typical Marksman heroes, his healing will allow them to deal more damage. Heroes like Lesley and Hanabi are good examples here.

strong.desc: Estes counters heroes with no burst damage, he can easily heal through minor damages from heroes like Faramis and Alice.

weak.desc: Estes is countered by heroes with high burst damage. Heroes like Saber and Eudora can easily burst down Estes or the hero he protects in a few seconds.

34.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_0a256a99be4eb87ce385515666707d17.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Scripture of the Moon Elf slowly charges Estes with energy. When the energy reaches 100 stacks, Estes' next Basic Attack will become enhanced, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target and 125<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 60% for 1.5s.

Estes recovers 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for the target allied hero immediately and links himself with them for 3s. While linked, both heroes gain 15 Hybrid Defense, and the target slowly recovers 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> HP. Linking with an allied hero increases Estes' Movement Speed by 15%, as well as the energy charging speed of the Scripture of the Moon Elf.

Being too far from the target will break the link.

Estes drops a flood of moonlight on the target area, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemy units within it. Afterwards, it turns to a domain of the Moon Goddess and reveals enemies inside it. Enemies will be slowed by 90% for 1.5s if they touch the edge of the domain area. (The slow effect will decay over time.)

Estes casts an enhanced <font color="a6aafb">"Moonlight Immersion"</font> on all nearby allied heroes. Within the next 8s, <font color="a6aafb">"Moonlight Immersion"</font> will be enhanced and Estes will continuously recover 1020<font color="62f8fe"> (+225% Total Magic Power)</font> HP.

34.name: Estes
34.story: Elf King who rules the Moon Elves.

assist.desc: Hilda works well with tanky heroes, which can create room for her to dish out more damage. Such as Atlas and Tigreal.

strong.desc: Hilda excels in prolonged battles. She works well against heroes with lower burst damage. Such as Zilong and Layla.

weak.desc: Hilda is countered by heroes with high sustain. Such as Thamuz and Uranus. This is because they can utilize their healing abilities to prevent being executed.

35.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/community/100_cdf5a0543dc8582be3b3be49971755c9.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Hilda regenerates 2% of her max HP per second while in the bush. When entering the bush, she gains a shield equal to 15% of her max HP. After leaving the bush, the shield lasts for 5s. This effect has a 10s cooldown.

Hilda's Basic Attack and Skills apply a <font color="a6aafb">Wilderness Mark</font> on hit, which lasts up to 4s and stacks up to 6. Each stack reduces the target's Physical Defense and Magic Defense by 4%.

Hilda activates the runic power of her great axe, increasing her Movement Speed by 60% for 3s and enhancing her next Basic Attack to deal 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slow the target by 40% for 3s. The attack will also deal 120<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies behind the target.

Hilda locks onto an enemy target, each time dealing 220<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Skill can be released 3 times at most. The 2nd attack will deal damage to target's surroundings, and the 3rd attack will knock back the target and surrounding enemies temporarily.

Hilda launches a powerful slash on the target enemy, dealing 600<font color="fba51f"> (+250% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and stunning them for 0.2s. Nearby enemies also take 60% damage. Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Wilderness Mark</font> makes <font color="a6aafb">Power of Wildness</font> deal 2.5% of the target's Max HP as extra damage. At max stacks, <font color="a6aafb">Power of Wildness</font> deals 20% of the target's Max HP as extra damage.

35.name: Hilda
35.story: Inheritor of the Power of the Megalith.

assist.desc: With her very powerful CC abilities, Aurora works well with heroes who deal high sustained damage, like Ixia, Freya, and Karrie.

strong.desc: Aurora counters heroes who like to charge in, such as Leomord, Thamuz, and Terizla, since her skills can stop them dead in their tracks.

weak.desc: Because most of Aurora's skills have delayed effects, she is countered by high mobility heroes who can dodge them with ease, such as Ling, Kadita, and Guinevere.

36.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/gms/image/ed2295c60bd772b89b7bdbbc2aee6095.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Upon taking fatal damage, Aurora freezes herself for 1.5s, becoming invincible during this time and gradually recovering 30% Max HP. This effect has a 150s cooldown.

Aurora's freeze effects can also affect Turrets.

Aurora summons an icy meteorite to strike at the target location, dealing 400<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slowing targets hit by 40% for 1s. Afterward, 5 hailstones fall, each dealing 40<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

Aurora blows Frosty Breeze in a fan-shaped area in the target direction, dealing 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit, and creating a frozen area at the far-end of the attack that deals a total of 225<font color="62f8fe"> (+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the area and freezes them for 1s.

Aurora creates a frost path in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the path and reducing their Movement Speed by 80% for 1.2s. The frost path gradually becomes glaciers that spread until reaching their maximum size and shattering, dealing 600<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in the area and freezing targets for 1s. Every 100 Magic Power that Aurora has will increase the freeze duration by 0.2s.

36.name: Aurora
36.story: The Maiden of the Glacier who grants eternal remembrance in the legends of the North.

assist.desc: Lapu-Lapu works well with heroes who can pull enemies together, like Tigreal and Atlas, to allow his AOE skills to hit more targets and get more Damage Reduction from his 2nd Skill in Great Sword stance by hitting more heroes.

strong.desc: Lapu-Lapu is strong against squishy heroes who lack movement abilities, such as Layla and Eudora, because he has high burst damage and can use his mobility to get on top of them.
